item.description:
Join me at Rhode Island's first-ever WordCamp in Providence!!!!

Whether you are thinking about making your first website, or are a developer already working in Wordpress, this is not to miss!!!!

What is WordCamp?

It's a day-long conference about Wordpress, one of the top 3 interfaces (the other two are Drupal and Joomla), used to design and develop your own websites and blogs!!! It's easier than you think, and the best part is, the interface is free and open source!

What do you do at WordCamp?

WordCamps are casual, locally-organized conferences covering WordPress topics which include sessions on how to use WordPress more effectively, beginning plugin and theme development, advanced techniques, security, and much more…

Why should I go to WordCamp?

This is for everyone from Beginners to Developers. There will be two tracks of speaker presentations to address both areas. WordCamps are attended by people ranging from blogging newbies to professional WordPress designers, developers and consultants that participate, share ideas, and get to know each other and is always an amazing and unique event.

What are you waiting for? This is the first-ever WordCamp in Rhode Island! It really doesn't get much better!

Tickets are only $19 and limited! So get them now: http://2012.providence.wordcamp.org/tickets/

Click here to learn more about WordCamps: http://central.wordcamp.org/

Click here to learn about WordPress:http://wordpress.org/

See you there!

Elsbeth
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a pink and brown scarf (the same as the one in my profile picture)!
item.name: Wordpress WordCamp Providence!!!!
